title: Number of vehicles imported into the United States by country 2012
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Imports in units in the y axis.
The Imports in units is highest at Country Japan and lowest at Country Germany.
The Imports in units of Country Japan is 3.07% larger than the minimum value at Germany.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Imports in units for 5 number of Countrys.
The maximum Imports in units 2441298.0 is found at Country Japan and the minimum is found at Germany where Country is 796121.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Imports in units in the y axis.
The Imports in units is highest at Country Japan and lowest at Country Germany.
The Imports in units of Country Japan is 3.07% larger than the minimum value at Germany.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Imports in units in the y axis.
The maximum Imports in units 2441298.0 is found at Country Japan and the minimum is found at Germany where Country is 796121.0.
The second highest Imports in units is appeared to be the Country Canada.
The difference of Imports in units between the highest and lowest Country is 1645177.0.
Imports in units at Country Japan is 2441298.0 , second place is Canada at 2105848.0, and thirdly is Mexico at 1440116.0.
The highest value 2441298.0 at Japan is almost 1.56 times larger than the average value 1563204.2.
The Imports in units is 7816021.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
